params.taskDescription:
Find the number of donors who were <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>O</mtext>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mi></mi>
      <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{O}{^ - }</annotation></semantics></math>; that is, find <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
    <mi>A</mi>
    <mo>∪<!-- ∪ --></mo>
    <mi>B</mi>
    <mo>∪<!-- ∪ --></mo>
    <mi>R</mi>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <msup>
        <mi>h</mi>
        <mo>+</mo>
      </msup>
    </mrow>
    <msup>
      <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
      <mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′<!-- ′ --></mi>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">n({(A \cup B \cup R{h^ + })^\prime })</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription:
Find the number of donors who were <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtext>A</mtext>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mi></mi>
      <mo>+</mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>or</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mtext>B</mtext>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mi></mi>
      <mo>+</mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>or</mtext>
  </mrow>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mtext>AB</mtext>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mi></mi>
      <mo>+</mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\text{A}{^ + }\,{\text{or}}\,\text{B}{^ + }\,{\text{or}}\,\text{AB}{^ + }</annotation></semantics></math>.

params.taskDescription:
Use Venn diagrams to prove that if <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>⊂<!-- ⊂ --></mo>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A \subset B</annotation></semantics></math>, then <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>∩<!-- ∩ --></mo>
  <mi>B</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A \cap B = A</annotation></semantics></math>.
